description: The ABN_NOTES table contains information about Advanced Beneficiary Notice note records.

columns.name: ABN_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: ABN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the ABN record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Notice Triggered


Notice Printed


ABN Signed, Service Accepted (Option 1 - Bill Medicare)


ABN Annotated (Patient Refused to Sign)


ABN Void (Order Canceled or Changed, ABN No Longer Applies)


ABN Signed, Service Declined


ABN Refused--Noted on form, Signed by Two Witnesses


ABN Refused--Service Not Performed


ABN Signed, Service Accepted (Option 2 - Do not bill Medicare)


Auto Voided (Order canceled or removed)


Diagnoses Reviewed


E-Signed, Document Status Not Updated

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who updated the ABN record.

columns.name: CREATE_TM
columns.description: The time the ABN record was created.

columns.name: INITIAL_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who created the ABN record.

columns.name: ABN_TEMPLT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ABN template used for the ABN form.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


English, Provider ABN


Lab ABNs


Spanish, Provider ABN


Non-Participating ABN


Dually Eligible Beneficiaries ABN


E-Signature Template

columns.name: ABN_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payor record ID associated with the ABN form.

columns.name: ABN_PR_EST
columns.description: The estimated price for all procedures listed on the ABN.

columns.name: ABN_COMM_BARRIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The communication barrier encountered with the patient involving the ABN.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ABN_UPDATE_INS_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the ABN was updated.

columns.name: ABN_CHECK_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Stores the starting date of service for which the ABN checks are performed.

columns.name: ABN_CHECK_TO_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date till which the ABN checks are performed.

columns.name: ABN_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the linked treatment or therapy plan.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) for the telephone encounter used for follow up.

columns.name: REPLACED_ABN_ID
columns.description: If this ABN was regenerated from another ABN, this column contains the ID of the original

columns.name: REPLACE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that the ABN was regenerated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Price Increase


Price Decrease


Department Change (same revenue location)


Department Change (different revenue location)


Procedure or Diagnosis or Order Mismatch (Px or Dx or Ord is now resolved)


Order Released


Order Resolved


Procedure or Order Mismatch (Px or Dx or Ord is now resolved)


ABN Restore Utility
